Blog.post: Is it possible to be anymore tired then i am? I have been busy all weekend and I haven't slept in my own bed in 2 days!!! I'm gunna sleep at least to 11:30. This time next year i will have my license. I can't wait. Well I'm going to bed

2 hours until summer break!! I just got done with my Computer Final so I'm gunna write something. The printer is so damn slow so I'd be able to write a freaky book here before the paper came out. My birthday is tomorrow! I think my mom is gunna take me to a movie. Well i don't know what else to type and i don't wanna get caught on here.

After my health final this kid said,"Dude, I heard you were Bi is that true...That's what everyone is saying." I can't stand people. Sometimes people don't know why I get mad about being called a fag but it's because I can count on hearing it every day. Sometimes I purposely take different routes to class or sit in different spot when I can. Tomorrow is the last day of school and I might actually not have to worry about other people.

My brain is going to explode I've been studying for 2 and a half hours. :( I'm just try not to worry about the finals and not think about it and time will pass. (Time will pass..Will you?) OH I want to get urlLink this shirt. haha. Today a local man and his dog got stuck inside of a washing machine. Local authorities and other emergency crews fought to rescue the man and his dog. Unfortunate the dog drown as the washer began filling with water as the police officers where on their donut break. The man however I recuperating a the local hospital.
urlLink Amish Donkey - Picture of the Day You should probably see this site.

Hey, I just got back from prison. The prison cleverly named " urlLink school ." Today I got pissed off because of this girl I can't stand!! Anyway I can't wait for my B-day. This girl who I talk to a lot (Lacie) is convinced that my b-day on the 26th when in fact it is the 28th. Oh well. I expect presents from all! What sucks more than finals? Nothing. I should probably study. I can't wait for my urlLink order to come in! Who cares? I do now i can use my camera for webcaming without draining the battery in 30 seconds!!! Anyway the party mess is cleaned up and one psycho neighbor sent me home with a bag of trash that got in his yard. I should of told him to go to hell! Oh and if anyone knows why people are moody (and dramatic) lately please comment!!

Nothing gunna hold them back! Party! After all who would run away from 2 kegs? Well some dude I've never seen in my life said i need to see him in a little bit so he can get me really messed up...rrrrright. Anyway no one has got me out of my room so i guess i'm good for awhile.
Today my brother is gunna have a party but I'm not sure how thats gunna go because it's 10:30 am and the sky is looking pretty gray. Oh well now my brother's freinds can't try to get me drunk!

Hey name is Drew and I'm 15 (well in 7 more days) and I'm a freshmen a Rock Falls High School. I can't wait for school to be over only 4 more school days! Today was sad urlLink Call for Help's last show was today :( urlLink Leo's the greatest person ever.I guess life goes on.

Today I went to Relay for Live with my mom and met up with Chaley. Her and I walked back to her house because we were gunna swim. Chaley's boyfriend doesn't want her talking to boys and most of all me. So she was a little worried. But we were swimming for awhile when the dog started barking and Chaley's boyfriend can out the back door. I couldn;t do anything but laugh I thought it was really funny but apparently not her boyfriend. So though it'd be best to change and leave so I did.
4 ppl like me! And only like one. Do don't wanna piss the rest of the off so I don't know what to do. In other news..I'm tired and going to bed.
